sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnprocessmon ( procs_id , procs_nm , procs_sttus , creat_dt , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #procsId# , #procsNm# , #procsSttus# , #creatDt# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnprocessmon SET procs_id = #procsId# , procs_nm = #procsNm# , procs_sttus = #procsSttus# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND procs_id = #procsId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnprocessmon WHERE 1 = 1 AND procs_id = #procsId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT procs_id , procs_nm , procs_sttus , creat_dt , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNPROCESSMON WHERE procs_id = #procsId#

SELECT A.PROCS_ID , A.PROCS_NM , A.PROCS_STTUS , A.CREAT_DT , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT PROCS_ID , PROCS_NM , PROCS_STTUS , CREAT_DT , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNPROCESSMON WHERE 1=1
PROCS_ID = #searchKeyword#
PROCS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY PROCS_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNPROCESSMON WHERE 1=1
PROCS_ID = #searchKeyword#
PROCS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
